ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews Howeird Stern the Shock Schlock Radio King!; One Fine Day in the Outback; Kojerk; Strange Places for Cellular Phones; Shoe Biz Is Going Show Biz!; Morons from Mars; Cracked Classroom TV Scream; Teenage Mutated Ninjerk Turdles Unfit Role Models for Our Children!; One Fine Tuesday Afternoon... or Was It Wednesday?; Random Funnies; I.M.A. Gray's Earthling Zoo; Paint Gunner Magazine; The Comic Book Restorer; Good News and Bad News for Teenage Mutated Ninjerk Turdles; Famous Funny Animals; More Cigarette Ads Aimed at Specific Groups!; Steel Cage Match; Mini-Movie Theatre!; One Fine Evening in Jersey City; Dear Hearts and Gentle People!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Three gags involving Dracula.
A scientist uses a time machine to restore comic books to their mint condition, but when he goes too far back he turns them into pulp.
